Which of the following Bollywood films have had their scripts requested by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences for the Oscar Library?
Options:
A. Madrasapattinam
B. Lagaan
C. Heroes
D. Rock On!!

Which of the following statements are true regarding the film *Madrasapattinam* and its recognition by the Academy Awards?
Options:
A. a) *Madrasapattinam* was requested by the Academy to be included in the Oscar Library.
B. b) The script of *Madrasapattinam* is preserved in the Oscar Library.
C. c) *Madrasapattinam* is the fifth Bollywood film to receive recognition by the Academy.
D. d) The Oscar Library does not include any Bollywood films.
Correct Answer: a) *Madrasapattinam* was requested by the Academy to be included in the Oscar Library., b) The script of *Madrasapattinam* is preserved in the Oscar Library., c) *Madrasapattinam* is the fifth Bollywood film to receive recognition by the Academy.
